original: @140a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @140a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pra bha wa dha ris'a dha nam /
analyzed: pra bha wa dha ris'a dha nam /
translated: Prabhāvatīsadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'od 'dzin ma sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: 'od 'dzin ma sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Prabhāvatī

original: bdud rtsi'i mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of Immortality, the Blessed Slayer of the Lord of Death.

original: gang zhig kha zas nyung ba yis //
analyzed: gang zhig kha zas nyung ba yis //
translated: For those who live on little food,

original: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis ngos na //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis ngos na //
translated: in terms of the requisites for life,

original: som nyi bza' bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: som nyi bza' bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to eat doubt,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len bshad //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len bshad //
translated: I will explain the elixir of meditative concentration.

original: gsum la skyabs song byang chub sems //
analyzed: gsum la skyabs song byang chub sems //
translated: Having gone for refuge to the Three [Jewels] and generated the spirit of enlightenment,

original: gnas bzhi la sogs @140b sngon song bas //
analyzed: gnas bzhi la sogs @140b sngon song bas //
translated: having gone through the preliminaries such as the four immeasurables and so forth,🔽in an instant, from the state of emptiness of the objects

original: skad cig nyid las yul rnams dang // yul can stong pa'i ngang nyid las //
analyzed: skad cig nyid las yul rnams dang // yul can stong pa'i ngang nyid las //
translated: and the subject,

original: pam las mtsho skyes dbus son pa'i //
analyzed: pam las mtsho skyes dbus son pa'i //
translated: in the middle of a lake arisen from paṃ,

original: nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo ni //
translated: in the middle of a sun, is the goddess

original: chu shel lta bu gri gug dang // bdud rtsi'i bum pa g-yas dang g-yon //
analyzed: chu shel lta bu gri gug dang // bdud rtsi'i bum pa g-yas dang g-yon //
translated: like crystal, holding a flaying knife and a vase of elixir in the right and left [hands],

original: dar dkar gos dang rin chen rgyan //
analyzed: dar dkar gos dang rin chen rgyan //
translated: wearing white silk and jeweled ornaments,

original: lang tsho rgyas shing sha rgyas ma //
analyzed: lang tsho rgyas shing sha rgyas ma //
translated: not too old, not too young,

original: li ba'i skra dang bung ba'i dri //
analyzed: li ba'i skra dang bung ba'i dri //
translated: with hair like a bee and the scent of a bee.

original: mdzes ldan ma yi brang dbus su //
analyzed: mdzes ldan ma yi brang dbus su //
translated: In the middle of the beautiful woman’s chest,

original: rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo ni //
analyzed: rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo ni //
translated: a goddess like oneself

original: dangs pa'i shel drung mu tig ltar //
analyzed: dangs pa'i shel drung mu tig ltar //
translated: is seen, like a pearl in a clear crystal,

original: dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i 'od can blta //
analyzed: dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i 'od can blta //
translated: white and shining with radiant light.

original: de nas rang snying shing 'bras ltar //
analyzed: de nas rang snying shing 'bras ltar //
translated: Then, one’s heart, like a fruit,

original: rtsi mo gyen ltar rtsa lta dang // bcas pa phyed nas mtshon gyis gcad //
analyzed: rtsi mo gyen ltar rtsa lta dang // bcas pa phyed nas mtshon gyis gcad //
translated: with the tip facing upward, is cut with a knife.

original: steng gi phyogs ni sangs rgyas lha'i //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs ni sangs rgyas lha'i //
translated: The upper part, the direction of the buddhas,

original: rtsa dang bcas te ltos med dbul //
analyzed: rtsa dang bcas te ltos med dbul //
translated: is pulled out without regard for the channel.🔽All the stains are expelled

original: nyon mongs lha yi rtsa sbubs nas //
analyzed: nyon mongs lha yi rtsa sbubs nas //
translated: from the channel of the afflicted gods

original: dri ma ma lus bshang lam nas //
analyzed: dri ma ma lus bshang lam nas //
translated: through the anus.

original: 'thon te rgya mtsho'i ngogs su bskur //
analyzed: 'thon te rgya mtsho'i ngogs su bskur //
translated: They are sent to the ocean shore.

original: rtsa stong bum pa'i bdud rtsis bkang //
analyzed: rtsa stong bum pa'i bdud rtsis bkang //
translated: The empty channel is filled with the amṛta of the vase.

original: lus dang rtsa dang khams bdud rtsi //
analyzed: lus dang rtsa dang khams bdud rtsi //
translated: The body, the channels, and the constituents are filled with amṛta.

original: ye shes rgyal po'i rlung rgyas te //
analyzed: ye shes rgyal po'i rlung rgyas te //
translated: The wisdom-king vāyu expands

original: phru ma mar gyis gang ba ltar //
analyzed: phru ma mar gyis gang ba ltar //
translated: like a bag filled with butter.

original: rang gi lus dang de bzhin sems //
analyzed: rang gi lus dang de bzhin sems //
translated: One’s body and likewise one’s mind

original: zag med bde bas rab rgyas te //
analyzed: zag med bde bas rab rgyas te //
translated: are completely filled with untainted bliss.

original: dmigs shing spros pa bcad pa yis //
analyzed: dmigs shing spros pa bcad pa yis //
translated: Since one severs the proliferation of the object,

original: ting nge 'dzin la gtad de gzhag / de ltar yang yang goms pa yis //🔽ting 'dzin zas su mi 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la gtad de gzhag / de ltar yang yang goms pa yis // ting 'dzin zas su mi 'gyur ba'i //
translated: By becoming accustomed to this again and again,🔽even all the worms that are not the food of meditative concentration

original: srin bu kun yang 'dzag 'gyur pas //
analyzed: srin bu kun yang 'dzag 'gyur pas //
translated: will ooze out.🔽Therefore, in order to accomplish that, one should strive in the great

original: de don bya phyir gsang sngags dang // smon lam che la 'bad par bya //🔽de ltar brten na zag med kyi //
analyzed: de don bya phyir gsang sngags dang // smon lam che la 'bad par bya // de ltar brten na zag med kyi //
translated: mantras and aspirations.🔽If one relies in that way, the supreme uncontaminated meditative concentration will arise, and

original: ting 'dzin mchog ni skye ba dang // gnyid rmugs la sogs byed pa'i zas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin mchog ni skye ba dang // gnyid rmugs la sogs byed pa'i zas //
translated: the food of sleep, lethargy, and so on

original: til tsam dgos par mi 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: til tsam dgos par mi 'gyur ba'i //
translated: will not be necessary even to the extent of a sesame seed.🔽White hair and wrinkles will be eliminated, and

original: skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // lus rgyas dangs shing sha stobs rgyas //
analyzed: skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // lus rgyas dangs shing sha stobs rgyas //
translated: the body will be full, with strong flesh and strong blood.

original: thig le rgyas shing 'dzag mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le rgyas shing 'dzag mi 'gyur //
translated: The bindu will be full and will not be emitted.

original: dus min 'chi bas mi gos te //
analyzed: dus min 'chi bas mi gos te //
translated: One will not be tainted by untimely death.

original: phyi nang mkha' 'gro bran du 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nang mkha' 'gro bran du 'gyur //
translated: The outer and inner dakinis will become servants.

original: 'dre sogs gnod par mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'dre sogs gnod par mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: Ghosts and so on will not cause harm.

original: 'gro kun dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro kun dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur //
translated: All migrators will be delighted and will be brought under control.

original: ci 'dod dam pa'i mchog ster te //
analyzed: ci 'dod dam pa'i mchog ster te //
translated: The supreme, sublime one will grant whatever is desired.

original: 'dod sred ma lus rab bcad nas //
analyzed: 'dod sred ma lus rab bcad nas //
translated: Having completely severed all craving for desire,

original: dus kyi dgrar ni myur 'gro'o //
analyzed: dus kyi dgrar ni myur 'gro'o //
translated: one will quickly go to the enemy of time.

original: de ltar bla mas gnang ba yi //
analyzed: de ltar bla mas gnang ba yi //
translated: Thus, with the permission of the guru,🔽the clear instructions,

original: man ngag gsal la nongs mchis rnams //
analyzed: man ngag gsal la nongs mchis rnams //
translated: whatever faults there are,

original: bzod par gnang zhing de yi ni //🔽dge bas gshin rje gshed gyur cig /'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len @141a * //
analyzed: bzod par gnang zhing de yi ni // dge bas gshin rje gshed gyur cig /'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len @141a * //
translated: I ask for forbearance in those.🔽By that virtue, may there be Yamāri.

original: gyi man ngag ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: gyi man ngag ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The method of accomplishing Ālokakāntā, the instruction of the elixir of samādhi, composed by Śrīdhara, who has attained mastery of samādhi, is complete.

original: // / lo pan snga ma dang 'dra /
analyzed: // / lo pan snga ma dang 'dra /
translated: The earlier lotsāwas are the same.

original: 'di'i man ngag gcig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste /
analyzed: 'di'i man ngag gcig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste /
translated: One instruction of this [was] previously [considered] a whispered lineage.

original: gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung//
analyzed: gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung//
translated: It is said that the text was not translated before.
